description: Try our easy to follow Bertocchi Premium Boneless Leg Ham recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Bertocchi Premium Boneless Leg Ham Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g Bertocchi Premium Boneless Leg Ham, sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Divide half of cheese among 4 slices of sourdough bread. Butter Bread. Top with pickles, Bertocchi Premium Boneless Leg Ham, and cheese. Close sandwiches and spread half of butter evenly over top of bread slices.

Butter top of Sandwich. Heat a large skillet, preferably cast iron, over medium-low heat. Melt butter in pan. Place sandwiches in skillet. Cook, pressing down with a spatula to encourage melting and turning once, until cheese is melted and bread is golden brown and crisp, 5â€“7 minutes
